schemas.name: queries.graphql
schemas.content:
type Query {
  users: [User]
  user(id: Int!): User!

  posts: [Post]
  post(id: Int!): Post!

  albums: [Album]
  album(id: Int!): Album!

  photos: [Photo]
  photo(id: Int!): Photo!

  todos: [Todo]
  todo(id: Int!): Todo!
}

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/MarkNjunge/graphql-placeholder/blob/a99674d4b00db32b1b0f9b77044d8e0883cd5565/src/graphql/types/queries.graphql:
type Query {
  users: [User]
  user(id: Int!): User!

  posts: [Post]
  post(id: Int!): Post!

  albums: [Album]
  album(id: Int!): Album!

  photos: [Photo]
  photo(id: Int!): Photo!

  todos: [Todo]
  todo(id: Int!): Todo!
}

# https://github.com/MarkNjunge/graphql-placeholder/blob/a99674d4b00db32b1b0f9b77044d8e0883cd5565/src/graphql/types/types.graphql:
type Post {
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  body: String!
  user: User!
  comments: [Comment]
}

input AddPostInput {
  title: String!
  body: String!
  userId: Int!
}

type Comment {
  postId: Int!
  id: Int!
  name: String!
  email: String!
  body: String!
}

type Album {
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  user: User!
}

type Photo {
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  url: String!
  thumbnailUrl: String!
  album: Album!
}

type Todo {
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  completed: Boolean!
  user: User!
}

type User {
  id: Int!
  name: String!
  username: String!
  email: String!
  address: Address!
  phone: String!
  website: String!
  company: Company!
}

type Address {
  street: String!
  suite: String!
  city: String!
  zipcode: String!
  geo: Geo!
}

type Geo {
  lat: String!
  lng: String!
}

type Company {
  name: String!
  catchPhrase: String!
  bs: String!
}

schemas.name: types.graphql
